mdRecord.dcterms:title: Members of Zion Lutheran Council
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A picture postcard of members of the Zion Lutheran Church council take and made in 1908 or 1909. Left to right, front row, J. Matt Pugh; Captain Jim Sowers; William Epperly; David Millis Left to Right, back row, W. A. Sowers; Rev. J. D. Utt; W. S. Phlegar; William Hatcher; C. D. Epperly
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lutheran Church
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
